flawed_nl_solution:
He read 400 pages from the 500 page book because 500 x 0.8 = <<500*0.8=400>>400
He read 200 pages from the 1000 page book because 1000 x (1/5) = <<1000*(1/5)=200>>200
He has read 604 pages in total.
He needs to read 196 more pages to reach 800 pages because 800 - 604 = <<800-604=196>>196

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600.0, not 604.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
